text: The men's 5000 metres event at the 1936 Olympic Games was on August 4 and August 7. The final was won by Finn Gunnar Höckert. He beat the Olympic record in Olympic record time. ==Results== ===Heats=== The 5 fastest runners in each heat went to the finals. Heat one Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Umberto Cerati 15:01.0 2 Harry Siefert 15:02.8 3 Don Lash 15:04.4 4 Ilmari Salminen 15:06.6 5 Aubrey Reeve 15:06.8 6 Åke Jansson 15:10.0 7 Raymond Lefebvre 15:15.4 8 Edmund Stadler 15:17.0 9 István Simon 15:25.0 10 Scotty Rankine 11 Friedrich Fischer 12 Ivan Krevs 15:40.0 13 Mohamed Ahmed Abu Sobea 14 Gottfried Utiger 15 Raunaq Singh Gill Heat two Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Gunnar Höckert 15:10.2 2 Frank Close 15:10.6 3 Józef Noji 15:11.2 4 Bror Hellström 15:12.0 5 Rolf Hansen 15:12.6 6 René Lécuron 15:14.2 7 Henry Nielsen 15:25.0 8 Karl-Heinz Becker 15:27.0 9 Tom Deckard 10 János Kelen 15:35.0 11 Hideo Tanaka 12 Oscar Van Rumst 13 Valentín González Heat three Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Henry Jonsson 14:54.0 2 Kohei Murakoso 14:56.6 3 Peter Ward 14:59.0 4 Lauri Lehtinen 15:00.0 5 Louis Zamperini 15:02.2 6 Salvatore Mastroieni 15:02.2 7 Roger Rochard 15:12.2 8 Cecil Matthews 9 Jenő Szilágyi 15:20.6 10 Max Syring 11 Milton Wallace 12 Hernando Navarrete 13 Michel Medinger Sr. ===Final=== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes Gunnar Höckert 14:22.2 OR Lauri Lehtinen 14:25.8 Henry Jonsson 14:29.0 4 Kohei Murakoso 14:30.0 5 Józef Noji 14:33.4 6 Ilmari Salminen 14:39.8 7 Umberto Cerati 14:44.4 8 Louis Zamperini 14:46.8 9 Rolf Hansen 14:48.0 10 Harry Siefert 14:48.4 11 Peter Ward 14:57.2 12 Frank Close 13 Don Lash 14 Bror Hellström Aubrey Reeve DNF Key: DNF = Did not finish, OR = Olympic record ==References== Category:Athletics at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Men's events at the 1936 Summer Olympics
title: Athletics at the 1936 Summer Olympics – Men's 5000 metres
